name: Roots & Shoots
description:
Top-down online multiplayer shooter (up to 4 players)

The fair is here!


The farmers are competing for the biggest root!  No rules!

Take your weapons, fight, and protect your big onion from the other farmers!


Play with keyboard & mouse or with gamepad!
Up to 4 players online!


Credits:
Marco Elizondo  - Programmer
Diego Nachon - Artist & Programmer
Daniel Nachon - Artist
